title: A triple reconciler stating the controversies whether ministers have an exclusive power of communicants from the Sacrament. Any persons unordained may lawfully preach. The Lords prayer ought not to be used by all Christians. By Thomas Fuller, B.D.
author: Fuller, Thomas, 1608-1661.
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed by Will. Bently, for John Williams at the Crown in S. Pauls Church-yard,
